intro: Sida foliosa, commonly known as the hairy sida, is a flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes cotton and hibiscus. Sida foliosa is often found in disturbed soils and can thrive in a variety of environmental conditions.
